targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  device,
  vargroup,
  varkey,
  value
FROM readings
WHERE
  device = "$device"
ORDER BY timestamp

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  device,
  vargroup,
  varkey,
  value
FROM readings
WHERE
  network = "$network"
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.svg_data:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  viewBox="0 0 200 200" >
  <circle id="circle" style="stroke: black; fill: #f8f8f8;" cx="100" cy="100" r="100"/>
  <line id="hour0" x1="100" y1="10"  x2="100" y2="0" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour1" x1="150" y1="13"  x2="145" y2="22" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour2" x1="187" y1="50"  x2="178" y2="55" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour3" x1="190" y1="100" x2="200" y2="100" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour4" x1="187" y1="150" x2="178" y2="145" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour5" x1="150" y1="187" x2="145" y2="178" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour6" x1="100" y1="190" x2="100" y2="200" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour7" x1="50"  y1="187" x2="55"  y2="178" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour8" x1="13"  y1="150" x2="22"  y2="145" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour9" x1="0"   y1="100" x2="10"  y2="100" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour10" x1="13"  y1="50"  x2="22"  y2="55" style="stroke: green;"/>
  <line id="hour11" x1="50"  y1="13"  x2="55"  y2="22" style="stroke: green;"/>
    <g>
      <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="45" style="stroke-width: 6px; stroke: green;" id="hourhand" />
      <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="15" style="stroke-width: 4px; stroke: blue;"  id="minutehand"/>
      <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="5"  style="stroke-width: 2px; stroke: red;"   id="secondhand"/>
    </g>
</svg>

targets.query:
from(bucket: "nationaltrust")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["network"] == "mordenhall")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vargroup"] == "dat") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["node"] == "zccaj9xu4ah")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
